ModMetaData.name: Pre Transcended (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Shinzy
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Shinzys mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=7670.0
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/PreTranscended
--- Original Description --- Not once has a faction been so skimpy about dropping their armor! Such armor - few loot - wow.
The pre transcendents are very, very futuristic and mostly unfriendly Comes with robotic companion friends!
